name: Central Park
desc: A large public park in New York City, featuring green spaces, lakes, and paths.

name: Eiffel Tower
desc: An iconic landmark in Paris, France, known for its iron structure and incredible views.

name: Great Wall of China
desc: A series of fortifications made of stone, brick, and earth across northern China.

name: Sydney Opera House
desc: A multi-venue performing arts center in Sydney, known for its unique shell-like architecture.

name: Mount Fuji
desc: Japan's tallest mountain and an active stratovolcano, located west of Tokyo.

name: Christ the Redeemer
desc: A famous statue of Jesus Christ in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, located atop Mount Corcovado.

name: Statue of Liberty
desc: A colossal neoclassical sculpture on Liberty Island in New York Harbor.

name: Taj Mahal
desc: A mausoleum in Agra, India, built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan for his wife Mumtaz Mahal.

name: Pyramids of Giza
desc: Ancient pyramids located in Egypt, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

name: Golden Gate Bridge
desc: A suspension bridge spanning the Golden Gate strait, the channel between San Francisco Bay and the Pacific Ocean.
